item.name: Get containers with at least one artifact
Get Artifacts with non null urls
Get containers with at least one requestURL in it
Get containers with at least one destinationDnsDomain in it
Get containers with at least one sourceDnsDomain in it
Find all runs of an app
Get containers string in its name and not closed
Find playbooks runs on a container
